translations: 摩洛神；造成牺牲的可怖事物

sentences.sentence: Moloch whose love is endless oil and stone!
sentences.translation: 火神他的埃是不尽的油料和石头！

sentences.sentence: Afortiori the influence of Moloch made them become sullen.
sentences.translation: 何况莫洛克神的影响也使他们变得忧郁起来。

sentences.sentence: Moloch whose breast is a cannibal dynamo! Moloch whose ear is a smoking tomb!
sentences.translation: 火神他的胸脯是吃人的发电机！火神他的耳朵是冒烟的坟墓！
